Activity: Start the day by checking emails and responding to urgent requests. Review the progress on the previous two goals.
Follow up with the graphic designer regarding the brochure and video production. Request updates on the timeline and provide any necessary clarifications.
Meet with @ir-1 to discuss the communication plan and get feedback. Incorporate feedback into the plan and finalize it.
Begin working on the third goal: 'Coordinate with Investor Relations on outreach efforts.' Schedule a meeting with @ir-1 to discuss outreach strategies and target UHNWI prospects.
Develop a list of potential UHNWI investors based on research and collaboration with @ir-1. Prioritize prospects based on their investment profile and potential interest in the fund.
Lunch break. Catch up on industry news and read articles about wealth management and investor relations.
Collaborate with @ir-1 to develop a personalized outreach strategy for each target UHNWI prospect. Tailor the messaging and communication channels to their individual preferences.
Draft email templates and other communication materials for the outreach efforts. Ensure that the messaging is clear, concise, and compelling.
Review the outreach materials with @ir-1 and make any necessary revisions. Ensure that the messaging is aligned with the fund's overall marketing strategy.
Summarize progress on the third goal and outline the next steps for tomorrow. Review emails and respond to any outstanding inquiries.
